properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 6 at 5:17AM AKST until January 7 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 4 to 8 inches.

* WHERE...Glacier Bay including Gustavus.

* WHEN...Noon today through 6 AM Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Heavy snow may be difficult
to manage.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will intensify this afternoon and
persist through Monday night before easing Tuesday.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

A warning means that a winter storm is already occurring or
imminent. This storm could pose a threat to life and property.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 AM AKST TUESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
